mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.consultant_id AS "consultant.id", a.consultation_type_id AS "consultationType.id", a.content AS "content", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" ,ct.name AS "consultationType.name" ,m.nickname As "consultant.nickname"
join consultation_type ct on ct.id = a.consultation_type_id join v_member m on m.id = a.consultant_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO consultation( id, consultant_id, consultation_type_id, content, create_date, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{consultant.id}, #{consultationType.id}, #{content}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
